item.description:
Hey, everyone! Our next meetup will be Sunday April 5, but we're starting at 3pm and will go until 6pm, including a brief discussion at the end about what we all learned. Please remember to be on time for this, and bring your pencils and calculators!

We will have one 202 board and at least two 101 boards. As we've mentioned before, 202 is much more complicated than 101 and involves a STRONG knowledge of the principles that lead to success in 101. This includes being able to accurately and quickly make changes to your Financial Statement.

So the 202 board will be restricted to only those who have gotten out of the Rat Race at least FIVE times.

Please call my cell (617-519-3163) if the doors are locked.

There is plenty of parking on Hemenway Street. There are resident signs for Fenway, but I haven't been ticketed the last three times we've met.

See you soon!
item.name: April 5 Cashflow Meetup
